Command.label: Command Name
Command.tooltip:
Command that will be used to get Info
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission

ReponseMessage.value: {0}, hier sind die TS-Daten: Server:255.255.255.255 PW:sicheresPW
ReponseMessage.label: Text to whisper to user
ReponseMessage.tooltip:
This message is send when the user is in the choosen permission group
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission

ReponseMessageToChat.value: Hey {0}, dir wurden die Teamspeak-Daten zugeflüstert ;)
ReponseMessageToChat.label: Response message to the chat
ReponseMessageToChat.tooltip:
This is the message the bot sends to the main chat
e.g.: Info to the user that he got a whisper message
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission

Permission.label: Permission level
Permission.tooltip:
Set the permission level for the command
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission

ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.value: Sorry {0}, der Befehl "{1}" ist nur für {2}!
ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.label: Not enough permissions response
ReponseNotEnoughPermissions.tooltip:
Response to the user w/o the correct permissions
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission

ReponseMessageToNonTwitch.value: {0}, der Befehl "{1}" ist nur im Twitch-Chat verfügbar.
ReponseMessageToNonTwitch.label: Not send from Twitch
ReponseMessageToNonTwitch.tooltip:
Response when the user has not send the command in the Twitch chat
{0} = Username
{1} = Command Name
{2} = Command Permission
